name: Guild Raid Progression for WoW and Raider IO
author: StreamWeasels

sections.faq:
Can the plugin display raid progress from multiple raids or difficulties at the same time?

Yes, the plugin allows you to display raid progress from multiple raids and difficulties simultaneously, you can do this through use of the shortcodes.

Can I customize the look and feel of the plugin to match my website and guild branding?

Yes, however this is a PRO feature only. The PRO plugin allows you to use your own colors and imagery to seamlessly blend with your website and guild branding.

Can I enable extra data such as boss names, completion percentage, and kill dates?

Yes, however this is a PRO feature only. The PRO plugin provides options to enable additional data like boss names, completion percentage, and kill dates.

Does the plugin support raids from previous WoW expansions?

Currently, the plugin only supports the latest raid from the latest WoW expansion. However, support for additional raids from previous expansions can be added on request.

Is there an API limit for Raider.io?

Yes, Raider.io has an API limit of 300 requests per minute.

What happens if I exceed the API limit from Raider.io?

If you exceed the API limit from Raider.io, you may experience temporary failures or errors when trying to retrieve data from the API, which should resolve themselves within one minute.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added support for new raid – Amirdrassil, the Dream’s Hope
  • Free users now have access to display heroic and mythic data
  • Updated freemius

1.0.3

  • updating freemius

1.0.2

  • Added support for new raid – Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible

1.0.1

  • Added vertical mode
  • Fixed a z-index bug on hovers

1.0.0

  • First release
sections.description:
Track WoW raid progress in real-time with our easy-to-use WordPress plugin.

The only Raider IO Integration for WordPress

Introducing the ultimate tool for World of Warcraft guilds using WordPress! Our plugin allows you to display real-time raid progression data from Raider.io directly on your WordPress site. Say goodbye to outdated and unreliable information – our plugin updates automatically to ensure accuracy. With easy setup and a user-friendly interface, you’ll have the latest information at your fingertips in no time. Keep track of your favorite guild’s progress and never miss a beat in the World of Warcraft universe.

Simply enter your WoW region, WoW realm and WoW Guild name, and this little widget will nicely display your progress from WoW’s latest raids – Vault of the Incarnates and Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible.

Display progress WoW Dragonflight Raids

Currently, this plugin holds data for:

  • Vault Of The Incarnates
  • Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible.
  • Amirdrassil, the Dream’s Hope

It will be updated as new raids are released and if there is a demand for me to add older or previous raids, I can do so. Please let me know.

Display progress from Normal, Heroic and Mythic modes

Users of this plugin can display progress from Normal, Heroic and Mythic modes. Simply select the mode you want to display from the dropdown menu.

Read More

If you want to learn more about Raid Progression for Raider IO, check out these links.

  • Learn More about PRO
  • WoW Raider – Getting Started Guide
  • Check out our YouTube Guides
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Join us on Discord
  • Need Help? Get in touch!
